      • buyProperty

        public void buyProperty()
        Method to check if the spot a player just landed on can be purchased if it can and the player has the money to do so, the property will be bought

      • payRent

        public void payRent()
        Method to check if a spot the current player landed on is currently owned and pays the rent to that player. If the current player doesn't have the funds to pay and also owns some property, they will auto-mortgage their properties until they have enough money to pay the rent. If they still don't have enough after mortgaging, they will then forfeit all of their assets to the player they owed money to.
